analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Abyākataṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasappaṭigho ca naakusalo nasappaṭigho
analyzed: abyākatam sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na sappaṭighaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na sappaṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ appaṭighena tīṇi. Akusalaṁ appaṭighena tīṇi. Abyākataṁ appaṭighena tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalam appaṭighena tīṇi akusalam appaṭighena tīṇi abyākatam appaṭighena tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ appaṭighañca abyākataṁ appaṭighañca tīṇi. Akusalaṁ appaṭighañca abyākataṁ
analyzed: kusalam appaṭigham ca abyākatam appaṭigham ca tīṇi akusalam appaṭigham ca abyākata

original: appaṭighañca tīṇi. Hetuyā pannarasa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pannarasa.
analyzed: appaṭighañca tīṇi hetuyā pannarasa pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pannarasa
